item.title: Showcase
item.description: Wasm4 Playground # Wasm4 Playground is a website that allows you to write, play, and share WASM-4 retro games. The site works by bundling the AssemblyScript and Roland compilers which compile your source code into portable .wasm files. The site then runs your game in a modified version of the WASM-4 runtime which automatically reloads when you click “Apply Changes”. View Github Page Visit Site Maze Wanderer # Maze Wanderer is a first-person “walking simulator” for the WASM-4 retro game engine.
